                                    MAYOR'S OFFICE

                                     Mayor James S. Solomon

                                    The Mayor‚Äôs Office is the Executive Branch of local government.  With approximately a dozen employees led by the Chief of Staff, the Mayor‚Äôs office coordinates with each department and agency across the city, working closely with the city council and conferring with residents, local businesses, and other key stakeholders to establish various policies, laws, and regulations that move the city forward.
